response.summary: I am a Civil Engineer; I have four years of experience in consulting and construction of civil works. During my professional career, I have managed personnel, coordinating budget allocation and in-ventory control, as well as structural drawing development. I have special interest in the manage-ment and administration of civil works.
response.skills: Problem Solving, Microsoft Power BI, Microsoft Office, Project Coordination, Teamwork, Microsoft Project, AutoCAD

profile_positions.description: Project design, execution and follow-up. Obtaining permits and licenses from local authorities, budget allocation coordination, plan the operation and schedule of the construction ensuring that deadlines are met, project status reports, personnel management, inventory control, regular communication with clients, sub-contractors, supervisors and other personnel involved in the projects, regular meetings with supervisors to assess daily progress, identify and resolve problems that may affect project performance to raise the requisition of materials and labor to guarantee the effective progress of the work,development of structural draw-ings.
profile_positions.title: Project management coordinator

profile_positions.description: Implementation and follow-up of the project in the execution of the soil laboratories. Preparation of project status reports, personnel management, coordination of budget allocation, inventory control, preparation of structural drawings.
profile_positions.title: Project management coordinator

profile_positions.description: Manual soil exploration by SPT test, paddle shear test, density field test. Project status report, personnel management.
profile_positions.title: Field Engineer

profile_positions.description: Manual soil exploration by SPT test, paddle shear test, density field test. Project status report, personnel management.
profile_positions.title: Field Engineer

profile_positions.description: Support in the design of rural aqueducts, AutoCAD drawing, budget and quantity calculations; for the municipalities located in the department of Sucre; presentation of the work plan for the construction of the aqueducts of the following municipalities Buenavista, Belén, Cayo de Palma, Cayo de la Cruz, Tablitas, Sampues, Santiago Apóstol, Cornetas and Las Pitas located in the department of Sucre (Colombia).
profile_positions.title: Assistant Engineer

profile_positions.description: Responsible for implementation, monitoring of operational performance and reporting on project progress. Organization of work teams. Management of material purchases. Construction of different types of metallic structures, handling AutoCAD. Calculation of metrics and budget.
profile_positions.title: Intership Civil Engineer-Steel structures

school.name: IELS Malta - Institute of English Language Studies

education.degree_name: Diplomado: Programación, presupuesto y control de proyectos de construcción
